explains: adj. 坐立不安的，不耐烦的；不满足现状的，求变的；得不到休息的，没有睡眠的

sentences.en: They all felt restless and unsettled.
My father seemed very restless and excited.
sentences.cn: 我父亲似乎非常坐立不安和兴奋。

sentences.en: By 1982, she was restless and needed a new impetus for her talent.
sentences.cn: 到1982年，她焦躁不安，需要一个新的对其才华的推动力。
